h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area
content: Follow the path from the Ashen Pass I Keeper's Shrine (the first shrine in Chapter 5). You'll come to an area where a fight is happening and fire is being thrown down. Beat the Pale-Axe Stalwart here, and he becomes an NPC to talk to.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_5_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Defeat the Pale-Axe Stalwart'.
The content is as follows:
Follow the path from the Ashen Pass I Keeper's Shrine (the first shrine in Chapter 5). You'll come to an area where a fight is happening and fire is being thrown down. Beat the Pale-Axe Stalwart here, and he becomes an NPC to talk to.
